explanation: having a negative or harmful effect on something
sentence: The match has been cancelled because of adverse weather conditions.
sentence_gap: The match has been cancelled because of _______ weather conditions.

explanation: from or at a great distance
sentence: Even from afar the castle was most impressive.
sentence_gap: Even from ____ the castle was most impressive.

explanation: a very deep, narrow opening in rock, ice, or the ground
sentence: They leaned over the rails and peered down into the dizzying chasm below.
sentence_gap: They leaned over the rails and peered down into the dizzying _____ below.

sentence: A curate is a priest of the lowest rank.
sentence_gap: A ______ is a priest of the lowest rank.

sentence: We will always remember our dear departed friends.
sentence_gap: We will always remember our dear ________ friends.

sentence: We have just received the information about the forthcoming conference.
sentence_gap: We have just received the information about the ___________ conference.

explanation: careful when using money or food, or (of a meal) cheap or small in amount
sentence: He has always been hard-working and frugal.
sentence_gap: He has always been hard-working and ______.

sentence: The lights of the village were glimmering in the distance.
sentence_gap: The lights of the village were __________ in the distance.

explanation: a feeling that you want to do a particular thing, or the fact that you prefer or are more likely to do a particular thing
sentence: We should be basing our decisions on solid facts, not inclinations and hunches.
sentence_gap: We should be basing our decisions on solid facts, not ____________ and hunches.

explanation: a place where a wild animal lives, often underground and hidden, or a place where a person hides
sentence: The tiger returned to its lair, where it snarled from time to time.
sentence_gap: The tiger returned to its ____, where it snarled from time to time.

sentence: Hold your scrotum in the palm of your hand.
sentence_gap: Hold your _______ in the palm of your hand.

sentence: His doctor advised him not to do any strenuous exercise.
sentence_gap: His doctor advised him not to do any _________ exercise.

sentence: What you need is some tender loving care.
sentence_gap: What you need is some ______ loving care.

explanation: an area of high land that is not near the coast
sentence: The whole plateau comprises one vast upland plain.
sentence_gap: The whole plateau comprises one vast ______ plain.

explanation: a type of work that you feel you are suited to doing and to which you should give all your time and energy, or the feeling that a type of work suits you in this way
sentence: Most teachers regard their profession as a vocation, not just a job.
sentence_gap: Most teachers regard their profession as a ________, not just a job.
